reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and she explains complex concepts clearly. Always available for office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Challenging coursework, but Prof. Chen is helpful when you ask questions. Great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Lectures can be dry, but the content is interesting. Wish there were more interactive elements in class.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's passion for math is contagious. His problem-solving techniques have been invaluable.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging labs and field trips. Dr. Green's research experience adds depth to the course material.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but lectures are hard to follow. Grading seems inconsistent at times.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wang's enthusiasm for chemistry is infectious. Her demos make complex reactions understandable.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of texts, but sometimes goes off on tangents. Essay feedback is helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia brings current events into discussions, making the course very relevant. Heavy workload though.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Seems knowledgeable but struggles to explain concepts clearly. Office hours are not very helpful.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Tanner's passion for art is evident. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Encourages healthy debates in class. Prof. Nguyen presents balanced views on controversial topics.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting material, but Dr. White can be intimidating when asking questions. Grading is fair.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez organizes great field trips. Her course has changed how I view environmental issues.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Clark is always willing to help. The practical projects are excellent.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Prof. Kowalski makes language study fascinating. Her examples from various cultures are eye-opening.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Good real-world examples, but lectures can be monotonous. Group projects are well-structured.

reviews.subject: Geology
reviews.review: Prof. Schmidt's field trips are the highlight of the course. Exams are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable but often seems unprepared for class. Assignments are returned late with little feedback.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Prof. Adams brings anthropology to life with her storytelling. Research opportunities are fantastic.
